title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - Revised
description: This RFC proposes a revised and expanded version of the requirements for the GoalCascadeVisualizer. The update includes detailed user stories, use cases, functional specifications, non-functional requirements (performance, security, scalability, etc.), data models, wireframes, and interaction design details. Ambiguities are clarified, success metrics are defined, a focus on responsive design for mobile and desktop platforms is added, and a comprehensive testing plan is outlined to ensure the tool's effectiveness. The task requires the review of all provided material to ensure alignment with project goals, and suggests a further exploration of potential integration points with other existing tools in our ecosystem. The task requires the input from multiple team members including frontend-developer, backend-developer, database-specialist, devops-engineer, qa-tester, security-specialist, and technical-writer. Upon review, please provide any necessary feedback or suggestions for improvement. If the RFC is ready for the next state, update the rfc_state field accordingly.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the data model, user interface, and integration with existing systems.

title: Set up Development Environment
description: Set up the development environment, including version control, build automation, and continuous integration/deployment pipelines.

title: Implement Backend Services
description: Develop the backend services for data storage, retrieval, and processing.

title: Develop User Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for visualizing goal cascades and navigating the system.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Ensure the system adheres to security best practices, including authentication, authorization, and data encryption.

title: Create Test Suite
description: Develop a comprehensive test suite, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests.

title: Write Documentation
description: Create user guides, technical documentation, and other supporting materials for the GoalCascadeVisualizer.

title: Deploy and Release
description: Deploy the GoalCascadeVisualizer to production environments and coordinate the release process.
